alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Christian; Crittenden; Hopkins; Muhlenberg; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:33PM EDT until July 01 at 11:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL MUHLENBERG...EAST CENTRAL CRITTENDEN...NORTHWESTERN CHRISTIAN...CENTRAL CALDWELL...HOPKINS AND SOUTHWESTERN WEBSTER COUNTIES... At 1033 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Olney, or near Dawson Springs, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Madisonville, Princeton, Providence, Dawson Springs, Earlington, Nortonville, Mortons Gap, Olney, Creswell, Farmersville, White Plains, Hanson, St. Charles, Nebo and Fryer. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 78 and 124. Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 39 and 43. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 29 and 34. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Christian; Crittenden; Hopkins; Muhlenberg; Webster
